snippet: A vote is set to take place on Monday morning. Russia had vowed to block a previous resolution, but diplomats said they had reached an agreement....

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and SOMINI SENGUPTA
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Beirut, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations. Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Paris, Hwaida Saad from Beirut and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: A vote is set to take place on Monday morning. Russia had vowed to block a previous resolution, but diplomats said they had reached an agreement.

headline.main: Aleppo Evacuations Will Be Monitored After U.N. Reaches Deal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Reaches Deal to Oversee Aleppo Evacuations Amid New Obstacles
